description:
Want to learn how to improve your home or holiday videos??

This quick course will get you on your way to creating a great results from your media!

In this course we will show you how to do the following:

  • Stabilse shacky footage
  • Colour Correct
  • Give it a cinematic look and feel
  • Add text or captions
  • Add extra effects into the video
  • Import and export your creations

I really hope you enjoy this course and it improves your work, taking this course will give you a good foundation for my other Adobe After Effects courses

Final thought

This course is all about having fun whilst learning... See you in there

All the best
David newton
title: After Effect Camcorder and Holday tips and tricks
